summary: Custom Preset for Bodyslide 2, I tried to combine a natural look + fantasy, or thats the idea, the scale is from a hourglass bodytype to a thick and voluptuous body.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Since several people asked me about what Bodytype/preset i was using in the pics i uploaded in my immersive wenches mod, i decided to share it too.


[color=#87fdce]I tried to combine a natural look + fantasy, avoiding a silicone look and increasing sagginess depending on the weights, thats the idea, the scale is from a hourglass bodytype to a thick and voluptuous body.[/color]


[color=#CCFB5D][size=3]INFO:[/size][/color]

-The file contains 2 presets: one for naked body and one to use with clothes/armor, the difference is clothes preset has cleavage, pushup, breasts are a little higher and size of nipples are reduced to avoid clipping.

-Weight 80 or 100 may clip in some armor depending if they were made for big proportions in mind.

-Lorefriendlyness depends on the weight of the NPC or your point of view, you decide. But the middle weights 40 or 60 can help to give you an idea to build your own bodytype from there if you want to edit the preset.

[color=#CCFB5D][size=3]REQUIRED MODS:[/size][/color]

[color=#CCFB5D][size=3]CBBE:[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]"Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-"[/url] by Caliente.

[color=#CCFB5D][size=3]BODYSLIDE 2:[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]"BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio"[/url] by Caliente.

[size=3]You should find the preset in several bodytypes in Bodyslide 2 like HDT Body, CT77 Body, CB++ Bodies, Calientes Bodies ,etc.

[color=#87fdce]I assume you know how to use Bodyslide 2 and how to use this preset to generate a body type depending on what you are using: HDT, TBBP, BBP,etc.

In any case you can google for tutorials or just check bodyslide 2, since just generating bodies is the easiest thing to do.[/color][/size]

Anyway i hope you like it or it helps you. :D[/size]

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/y8nzq0T.jpg[/img]
